300mm Pedestrian Traffic Lights

You are here

Home » 300mm LED Traffic Signals

Product Catalog

 
  • Mini Traffic Signals
  • 200mm Traffic Signals
  • 300mm Traffic Signals
    • 300mm Traffic Modules
    • 300mm Pedestrian Modules
    • 300mm Traffic Lights
    • 300mm Pedestrian Lights
  • 400mm Traffic Signals
  • Traffic Countdown Timers
  • Warning Signals
  • Road Studs Series
  • Toll Station Traffic Signals
  • Traffic Controller Series

Pedestrian Signals in size of 300mm come in variations with digital countdown timers (99 or 199 version), with running or walking motion of green pedestrian symbol, with red hand symbol, or with combined unit of red pedestrian symbol and countdown timer. Every signal comes with highly-durable polycarbonate housing and sun visors, stainless steel screws, instruction manual and installation brackets.
